metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5669 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The do_shmat function in ipc/shm.c in the Linux kernel through 4.9.12 doesnot restrict the address calculated by a certain rounding operation, whichallows local users to map page zero, and consequently bypass a protectionmechanism that exists for the mmap system call, by making crafted shmgetand shmat system calls in a privileged context.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5669` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-142-generic - 3.13.0-142.191
